message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm willing to start with a price of $150.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. It's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your offer, but I still believe $120 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick with my original offer.
I'm not willing to go back to $120, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll meet you at $130. It's a good price for both of us, and I think you'll find it's a fair deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to stick with my original offer of $120 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're not on the same page. I'll make one more serious offer. I'll sell the product to you for $140. This is my final compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your efforts in adjusting your offer, but I still believe $120 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick with my original offer.
